name: Prayer Bracelets
description:
Prayer Bracelets are designed to stimulate you, give you reason to contemplate and breath. Each bracelet is made for you individually and each stone, a place to stop, rest and relax.
 
These Bracelets are individually designed from what materials I have available. Each Bracelet will always have an Indian Prayer Stone depicting either the Buddha or Quan Yin, there will always be a beautiful piece of Chinese Turquoise, and end piece that is a unique bezel set treasure atop a patterned vintage serving tray. The rest is up to you; You tell me what color vintage Asian ceramics you want for the other 2 remaining pieces. I can usually find something similar to what you are looking for. 

I will send your a photograph of the pieces laid out as the bracelet would look. Each bracelet is 7 1/4 inches long, the stones are set in sterling silver atop vintage 1960 heavily patterned serving trays. Each comes with an oversized lobster claw clasp so you can make the bracelet adjustable to fit your wrist.

options.name: Made from similar materials and custom made to order

name: Cobalt Blue and White Chinese Vase Link Bracelet
description:
This bracelet was made from a Dark Cobalt Blue and White Chinese vase. All 5 pieces are individually hand cut and shaped, then set in sterling silver. The pieces are mounted on Vintage 1960's Serving trays that are heavily patterned and have beautiful designs; it is then hand polished to a high finish. 

The bracelet is adjustable by using the oversized lobster claw clasp to attach it to any one of the jump rings to fit your wrist. Bracelet measures 7 1/4 inches\. Larger sizes available

Bracelets will be made from the same material with slight variation in shape and pattern.

options.name: Bracelets will be made from the same material with slight variation in shape and pattern.

name: Lavender Tea Cup Earrings
description:
These beautiful Lavender earrings are made from a Chinese Tea Cup. They re entirely handmade from sterling silver and vintage 1960's silver serving trays. Each pair has a white floral pattern. They are finished with beautiful French ear wires. 

Each pair is custom made from the same material but will have variations in design from the photograph

options.name: custom made from the same material but will have variations in shape and design from the photograph

name: Mixed Ceramic Bracelet
description:
This bracelet is made from: Sushi Plate, (Black&White), Vintage Blue Willow China, Chinese Vase, (Blue&White Circle), Chinese restaurant Plate, (Mint Green/ Flowers), Contemporary Flower Bowl, (Red/White Flowers).

They are made from Sterling Silver and Vintage 1960's Silver Plated Serving Trays. Each bracelet is a unique, One of a Kind, piece of jewelry. They make great gifts and until the 30th of November are $125.00, a 30% savings from retail

All bracelets are custom made from the same material but will have variations in daze and design from the photograph

options.name: custom made from the same material but will have variations in daze and design from the photograph

name: Fiery Red Chinese Earrings
description:
This Hot earrings are made from a contemporary Chinese bowl. They are brilliant, fiery red with small floral designs. They are entirely handmade from sterling silver and backed with vintage 1960's silver-plated serving trays. They are suspended from beautiful French ear wires and are the perfect accessory for casual and business. 

 Each pair is custom made and are the same materials but ill have slight differences from the photograph.

name: 1960's Gold Plated Serving Tray Skull Earrings

I have enough material for only 6 pair of these beautiful handmade, one of a kind Skull earrings made from a 1960's Gold Plated Serving trays. ...Perfect for Halloween or El Dia De Los Muertos....

Each pair is custom made and will have slight variations from the photograph

name: Cinnabar with Crane and Flowers Pendant
description: Only one of this beautiful pendant available. It is made from deep red Cinnabar, Sterling Silver and backed with a Vintage 1960's Serving Tray. The pendant is 1 1/4 inch long by 1 inch wide and has a large enough bale for a large chain or cord.

name: Chinese Plum Earrings
description: These Heavily Patterned Chinese Earrings are entirely handmade.  The soft triangles are hand cut from a Chinese Tea Pot they are then set in sterling silver atop of vintage 1960's Silver Plated Serving trays as backplates. French ear wires gives the earrings a wonderful movement.

name: 2008 Beijing Olympic Commemorative Plate Earrings
description:
These are the most unique material I've used in quite awhile. They are made from a, 2008 Beijing Olympic Commemorative plate, Set in Sterling Silver, and soldered onto 1960's Vintage serving tray backs. They are finished with heavy gauge French earwires.

You will be the only one wearing these beautiful cobalt and blue earrings. The rest of the plate is heavily patterned in wave patterns.

I have enough material for about 5 pr

name: Chinese Green Rectangle Earrings
description:
These beautiful rectangle earrings are made from a Chinese soup bowl They are hand cut, then set in sterling silver, atop vintage 1960's serving trays. Heavy French ear wires with rubber clutches finish the pair. 


10 Pair available

name: Japanese Sushi Plate Earrings
description:
These earrings are hand-cut and hand-made from a contemporary Japanese Sushi Plate. They are  avery simple Black and White pattern. They are surrounded by sterling silver, set atop heavily patterned vintage 1960's serving trays and finally suspended from heavy gauge French Ear wires. 

These unique earrings are a real conversation piece, especially when people find out what they are made from.  I have enough material for about 10 pair of these limited edition earrings.

All earrings are custom made to order from the same materials and will have slight variations.

description:
These earrings are made from up-cycled, red lacquered ChopSticks. There are capped in sterling silver, suspended from a sterling silver bezel and finished with a 3/4 inch continuous hoop.

Same materials/ slightly different

description:

They are very colorfully, contrasting, standout colors. They are surrounded by sterling silver, set atop heavily patterned vintage 1960's serving trays and finally suspended from heavy gauge French Ear wires. 

All earrings are custom made to order from the same materials and will have slight variations.

name: Heart Map Pendant
description:
These unique pendants are entirely handmade from any location on the map you want it to be. Maybe a special place where you lived, a magical place, or perhaps where you would like to be. Each pendant is surrounded by Sterling Silver, then set under a piece of recycled Plexiglass. The back is hand textured nickel silver and hand stamped into it are the words:

                                                WHERE 
                                                   U R 
                                                  I AM 

Each Pendant is suspended from a piece of recycled copper pipe and hangs from a bead cord. . 

Please be very specific as to what part of the world map you want. Thank you...and safe travels

These are great pieces of jewelry in that for each one we sell, $2.00 is donated to a local cause. 

Type the word...Heart...into the discount box when checking out and get 10% off all Heart Map Pendants. Share it with your friends and they can get the discount too!

name: Vintage Serving Tray, Dia De Los Muertos Skull Earrings
description:
These earrings are hand cut and handmade from Vintage 1950's and 1906's silver plated serving trays. They have a variety patterning, are light weight and hang from heavy French ear wires. 
Thanks Marissa for the photographs of the earrings and you wearing them.

Each pair come with the magic I believe amulets of this nature have. Wear them well and remember,  El Dia De Los Muertos is just around the corner

All earrings are custom made to order from the same materials and will have slight variations.

options.name: All earrings are custom made to order from the same materials and will have slight variations.

name: Chinese Soup Bowl Earrings

name: Small Heart Earrings from Vintage Serving Trays. Item #STRS
description:
These Small Heart earrings are hand-cut from vintage 1950's and 1960's Silver Plated Serving Trays. Each is highly decorative and patterned, slightly domed, brushed polished for a soft finished then suspended from  heavy French ear wires. I look for the most decorative over the top trays I can find.
They are very unique in that no two will ever be alike. 

Use code: STRS when ordering. 
Note when ordering, each tray varies in patterning and design so the finished product will always be different from the photographs.

Each back is different and because the silver plate is over brass, there will often be a brass coloration with a slight hint of silver

name: Heart Song Pendants,
description:

Each back is different and because the silver plate is over brass, there will often be a brass coloration with a slight hint of silver Each Pendant is suspended from a piece of recycled copper pipe and hang from a bead cord. name: Heart Buck Pendants
description:
These unique pendants are made from an actual Dollar Bill, surrounded by Sterling Silver, then set under a piece of recycled Plexiglass. The back is hand hammered, hand textured recycled copper, and stamped on the back of each are the words, "HEART BUCKS". Each is suspended from a piece of recycled copper pipe and hang from a bead cord. Each will be slightly different, when ordering please specify front or back

These are great pieces of jewelry in that for each one we sell wholesale, $2.00 is donated to a local cause. 

As long as there are dollar bills I'll keep making them.

Use code: HBP1 when ordering
Each will be slightly different, when ordering please specify front or back of the dollar you would like used.
